column1: Uchi////I was traveling in Houston this week and had to spend the weekend so decided to go to this restaurant. I really highly recommend this to anybody if you like any kind of sushi or fusion type
column2: you cannot go wrong. I had the crispy brussel sprouts the Walu Walu the Zero Sen
column5: there was not one bite that I regretted
column6: finished it all off with fried milk. The place was hopping and I was lucky to walk in at 7:30 and sit at the bar. Bartender was awesome and really knew his stuff..
